## Description {#details}

Extract custom tag option.

Look through <code>Options</code> for the <em><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/ilist-tag">ilist&#95;tag</a></em> option, pulling out the custom tag type, using void as a default.

Definition at line 103 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/adt/ilist-node-options-h">ilist&#95;node&#95;options.h</a>.
